thumb.title: "Splitting in the Nines (ft. Yuina & MEIKO V3)" (Prod. grayskies)
thumb.description: Credits: "Splitting in the Nines (ft. Yuina & MEIKO V3)" (Prod. grayskies) Lyrics, tuning & video: Scarlett_Candela (紅_明り) Music/Composer/Instrumentalist: grayskies Mastering & title lettering: ChulipP Vocal data by: PartyP Art: daisymelsart Stock footage: Jun Li, Media Whale Stock, Okan Akdeniz, Cherd Niyomsup, Sampath Liyanage & alasabyss *All stock footage is being used under the "Free License" with attribution for Vecteezy.com *** To you, my beloved Haruka, Goodbye. May the love I have for you, follow you no matter where you go.*** To hear more songs from LGBTQIA+ producers, please support our album "Soundwave Parade". This is a charity album for Pride Month with various songs from Vocaloid producers, including myself! Release day is June 30th 2025 & will be available to buy/stream on Bandcamp, Spotify & Apple Music. All Bandcamp proceeds will go to Rainbow Railroad, a LGBTQAI+ charity organization to help at risk individuals with emergency relocation, crisis response, cash assistance, and other forms of assistance. https://linktr.ee/soundwaveparade

tags.tag: オルタナティヴ・ロック
